item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: http:.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you have an account and you log in to this site, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

Therefore we organize two types of events, retreats and discussion panels. Each one of them strives to achieve different goals with the same visionâbringing balance to our day to day life. During our panel discussions, we touch on sensitive subjects that stay on the path to empowerment. From the business situation of females through strong expectations towards males to work-life balance, or rather lack of it caused by the speed of life we live. Everyone is welcome to join and share their perspective with our carefully selected speakers' panel.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row eq_height="yes" content_placement="top" css=".vc_custom_1509627956258{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInLeft" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1583157326572{padding-top: 30% !important;padding-bottom: 30% !important;background-image: url(https://rempower.tech/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/0.jpeg?id=356) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInRight" width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1509714379468{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-color: #f1f8f9 !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="The New Decade is Female" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24|line_height:45px" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700" css=".vc_custom_1583161899397{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frempower.tech%2Fevent%2Fthe-new-decade-is-female%2F|title:The%20New%20Decade%20is%20Female||"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1583161785635{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Join us in Hong Kong for the Rempower.Tech panel discussion on why the new decade is female. font_container="tag:h2|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24|line_height:45px" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700" css=".vc_custom_1583161103188{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frempower.tech%2Fevent%2Ftedxtinhauwomen%2F|title:Bold%26Brilliant%20TedX|target:%20_blank|"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1583159473369{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"]

TEDxTinHauWomen, a women-dedicated TEDx community in Hong Kong, will return on December 6 from 1pm-7pm with a TEDWomen live-stream session, live talks and performances at the ICC, Sky 100 in Kowloon.

This yearâs event is inspired by the idea of us all being very different people with varying perspectives and views on the world. Being bold takes courage, being brilliant takes others to believe in something collectively, we all have the power to make change. Everyone is capable of brilliance, it takes courage to be bold and to encourage others to shine. Donât apologize for your brilliance. Audience members will be inspired to be Bold and Brilliant *without apologies.

The new common language will be more simple and regular than the existing European languages. It will be as simple as Occidental; in fact, it will be Occidental. item.title: About
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1509647190847{padding-top: 5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="About" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:68px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1509647202668{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Coming from three different backgrounds and industries, we have noticed the same tendencies and disempowerment with people: working mothers, entrepreneurial husbands, and fathers, lonely rangers, and many others. Yet all of them stressed, in a rush, full of insecurities or anxietiesâyou name it. Even the most empowered of us, sooner or later, come to the point of questioning our reality. And all of us are trying to find this personal balance using wearable devices, like fitness trackers, mindfulness programs, retreat options, life coaching, and many other techniques. Then, how many of us are actually using the information collected to change behaviors? How successful are we in breaking habits and building new routines? Better ourselves? Become self-minded? Bothered by this state, we have decided to bring it all together and focus on actionable and sustainable insights driven by the newest technological advancements and personalized touch. The number of wearable devices has doubled in the past three years. Most wearables measure heart rate, sleep, blood pressure, weight, fitness activity, etc. However, many of us do not know what to do with the data; what is the next step? Rempower.Tech makes one's data USEFUL, ACTIONABLE for people, and INSIGHTFUL for organizations.Â [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]We focus on HEALTH-MINDED INDIVIDUALS seeking to improve health in novel ways. HEALTH-MINDED ENTERPRISES vested in the holistic development of team members. COACHES AND TRAINERS offering unique, high impactÂ programs How does it work? We cooperate with wearable device providers to collect biometric data in the environment tailored to your needs, surrounded by a caring community. Moreover, with the use of data, we provide very actionable insights and predictions concerning your well-being. The result is balance and the synergy among the wellness community, technology, and people. Rempower.Tech's mission is toÂ EMPOWERÂ andÂ DRIVE TRANSFORMATIONAL CHANGEÂ inÂ LIFE,Â RELATIONSHIPS, and theÂ ENVIRONMENT.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1583574757739{padding-top: 18% !important;padding-bottom: 18% !important;background-image: url(https://rempower.tech/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/AdobeStock_182530897-scaled.jpeg?id=680) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="7/12"][vc_custom_heading text="âTake the reins Leave it all Find a dream Take it all Breathe the air Taste the lifeâ" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:66px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.2" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp"][vc_custom_heading text="Honeymoon Shaker" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff" google_fonts="font_family:Paprika%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1583581465406{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 2% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Amazing Portfolio" css=".vc_custom_1583581536234{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="763" img_size="full" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1584048709115{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Retreats" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:16px|text_align:center|color:%231c1c1c|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_600" css=".vc_custom_1584048256764{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frempower.tech%2Fretreats%2F|title:Rempower.Tech%20retreats||"][vc_column_text]

We are organizing empowerment retreats locally in Hong Kong and globally. Remember, the world is our playground.

[/vc_column_text][vc_button title="Learn more" color="custom" custom_font_size="11px" custom_text_color="#4a90e2" custom_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)" custom_border_color="rgba(91,201,140,0.01)" custom_text_color_hover="#494949" custom_color_hover="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)" custom_border_color_hover="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)" href="https://rempower.tech/retreats/"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="766" img_size="large" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1584048785395{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Technology" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:16px|text_align:center|color:%231c1c1c|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_600" css=".vc_custom_1584048379578{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frempower.tech%2Ftechnology%2F|title:Rempower.Tech%20Technology||"][vc_column_text]

We make technology embrace human empowerment. Actionable insight is our core.

[/vc_column_text][vc_button title="Learn more" color="custom" custom_font_size="11px" custom_text_color="#4a90e2" custom_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)" custom_border_color="rgba(91,201,140,0.01)" custom_text_color_hover="#494949" custom_color_hover="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)" custom_border_color_hover="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)" href="https://rempower.tech/technology/"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="764" img_size="large" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1584048813441{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Community" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:16px|text_align:center|color:%231c1c1c|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_600" css=".vc_custom_1584048321787{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frempower.tech%2Fpaneldiscussions%2F|title:Rempower.Tech%20Community||"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_button title="Learn more" color="custom" custom_font_size="11px" custom_text_color="#4a90e2" custom_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.01)" custom_border_color="rgba(91,201,140,0.01)" item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Retreats
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1583411781834{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;background-image: url(https://rempower.tech/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/AdobeStock_53644925-scaled.jpeg?id=437) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1509646073541{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Retreats" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:68px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700"][vc_column_text]The state of our physical health is often rooted in our mental and emotional health. On the cutting edge of technology and mind-body innovation, many applications make accessing the subconscious mind easier than ever. With continued research proving the power that our subconscious minds hold over our lives, this connection can alter both our emotional and physical states equally, giving us opportunities to become happier, healthier, and more stable human beings. Our retreats benefit from the power of technology synchronized with body and mind to rewire happier you![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row eq_height="yes" content_placement="top" css=".vc_custom_1509627956258{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInLeft" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1583412760528{padding-top: 30% !important;padding-bottom: 30% !important;background-image: url(https://rempower.tech/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/AdobeStock_159049335-copy-scaled.jpeg?id=434) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInRight" width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1583414596431{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-color: #f1f8f9 !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Finding Peace" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24|line_height:45px" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700" css=".vc_custom_1583415721899{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frempower.tech%2Fevent%2Ffinding-peace%2F|title:Finding%20Peace||"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1584215562432{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"]In times of crisis and confusion, living our truth will carry us trough. Remember, you are in control. Yet, for that, you need to experience inner and unshakeable peace. We will take you on a journey to renew your body, mind, and spiritâan inward journey in a safe, sound, and relaxing environment. We will immerse you in the retreat experience and send you back home with a sense of peace that remains long after the physical experience is over.[/vc_column_text][vc_button title="View Retreat Details" color="custom" custom_font_size="12px" custom_line_height="25px" custom_font_weight="600" custom_color="#02abdb" custom_border_color="#02abdb" custom_color_hover="#c2e6f6" eq_height="yes" content_placement="top" css=".vc_custom_1509627956258{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInLeft" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1583413180606{padding-top: 30% !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInRight" width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1509714457942{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-color: #f1f8f9 !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Rewired to Happy" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24|line_height:45px" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700" css=".vc_custom_1583415681422{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frempower.tech%2Fevent%2Frewired-to-happy%2F|title:Rewired%20to%20Happy||"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1584217790087{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Imagine that you are the architect of your brain. Until recently, the conventional thinking was that our brains were hardwired at birth and therefore unchangeable. But the good news is that our daily experiences are continually reshaping our brains â that is the neuroplasticity. You can control and improve how you think, act, and behave as long as you choose your actions and experiences with care. During the event, we will provide you with methods and techniques to architect your brain for a better self.[/vc_column_text][vc_button title="View Retreat Details" color="custom" !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-color: #f1f8f9 !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Life-Balance Algorithm" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24|line_height:45px" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700" css=".vc_custom_1583415599897{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frempower.tech%2Fevent%2Flife-balance-algorithm%2F|title:Life-Balance%20Algorithm||"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1584218538890{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Trying to keep up with the ever-increasing demands of a busy lifestyle feels like an impossible task. Many of us inevitably find ourselves taking on more and more commitments, while at the same time continually analyzing our performance and wondering why our life seems out of balance. During the event, we allow you to rediscover that personal time matters, prioritization and focusing on fundamentals. And, most importantly, how to take it peacefully with inner balance.[/vc_column_text][vc_button title="View Retreat Details" color="custom" custom_font_size="12px" custom_line_height="25px" custom_font_weight="600" custom_color="#02abdb" custom_border_color="#02abdb" custom_color_hover="#c2e6f6" custom_border_color_hover="#02abdb" align="left" href="https://rempower.tech/event/life-balance-algorithm/"][vc_separator style="solid" color="#d5e5e8" padding_top="25" padding_bottom="25"][jump_links values="%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22LIFE%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20fa-hashtag%22%7D%2C%7B%22label%22%3A%22ALGORITHM%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20fa-hashtag%22%7D%2C%7B%22label%22%3A%22MIND%20BODY%20SOUL%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20fa-hashtag%22%7D%5D" style="custom" link_align="left" link_spacing="30px" link_font_size="11px" link_font_weight="600" link_line_height="1" link_color="#1d1c24" link_color_hover="#c8da2c"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Our Events Calendar" font_container="tag:h2|text_align:center" css=".vc_custom_1584218691611{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 2% !important;}"][events_cal count="4" columns="4" text_align="center" show_image="no" show_excerpt="no"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="Collect Data with the best in class devices" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_300" css=".vc_custom_1585432047250{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Rempower.Tech was created with the individual needs in mind - therefore, we work with the best partners providing emotion detection and recognition solutions. From Concept and Design to Development and Implementationâ everything is done with empowerment and well-being in mind. Visit site of our partners Mindfio andÂ Neuroon. And check out soon for more on affective computing solutions![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row eq_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="Participate in the re-empowerment ecosystem" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:right|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_300" css=".vc_custom_1585432097086{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Rempower.Tech provides ecosystem and platform where true empowerment becomes a reality. Thanks to our fantastic Community, you can engage in most comfortable forms from digital engagement via networking, blogging, knowledge sharing to physical participation in our events, and retreats.

Go to our Events Calendar,Â Knowledge Park andÂ Membership PageÂ for more information.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="892" img_size="large" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1585436894177{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1585436942165{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"]
Content & Environment
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row eq_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1585431640058{background-color: #c8da2c !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="891" img_size="large" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1585436795130{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1585436551948{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"]
Data Science

Moreover, our ecosystem allows you to change that insight into reality, thanks to best in class coaches, mentors, events, digital forums, and a community that empowers you to empower your tomorrow. Sign up to become part of something great![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1585431612563{padding-top: 5% !important;}" section_id="benefits"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Benefit from the Empowerment!" font_container="tag:h2|text_align:center"][vc_column_text]

item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1583531415890{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;background-image: url(https://rempower.tech/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/240_F_188714572_e9UZIJ0YoqPvg9Y1qT5U3idf2gYEaqZ4.jpg?id=635) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1509719609349{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Knowledge Park" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:58px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700"][vc_column_text el_class="font_weight_300"]Welcome to our Knowledge Park, where we present to you the reflection and science behind Rempower.Tech and its community.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][cr_posts_list show_comments="no" include_categ="" include="" author_select=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1509723594980{padding-bottom: 10% !important;}"][vc_column css_animation="rotateInUpLeft"][vc_separator style="solid" color="#eaeaea" padding_bottom="80"][tagline_box call_text="Share with us your post!" call_text_small="All Members are encouraged to submit their reflection regarding empowerment, stress, and anxiety of daily life, and most interestingly role of technology in these. The best post will get published on our website and promoted on during our events. We want you involved!" title="Share Now!" target="_blank" color="custom" custom_bg_color="#ffffff" custom_inner_padding="20px" custom_title_font_size="20px" custom_title_font_weight="600" custom_description_color="#7b7c7f" custom_description_font_size="14px" custom_description_font_weight="400" custom_description_line_height="22px" button_align="middle" button_text_font_size="13px" button_text_font_weight="600" button_text_line_height="30px" button_border_color="#02abdb" button_bg_color="#02abdb" href="https://rempower.tech/contact/"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Empowerment and Technology Web Resources"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][flip_box front_head_size="20px" front_text="by Harvard Business Review" back_head_size="20px" back_text="Recent research provides strong evidence that practicing non-judgmental, present-moment awareness (a.k.a. mindfulness) changes the brain, and it does so in ways that anyone working in todayâs complex business environment, and certainly every leader, should know about." back_text_size="14px" front_border_color="#ffffff" back_link="https://hbr.org/2015/01/mindfulness-can-literally-change-your-brain" target="_blank" icon_type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-ravelry" icon_back="no" front_head="Mindfulness Can Literally Change Your Brain" back_head="Read More" back_inner_bg_color="#ffffff" back_border_color="#ffffff" front_text_color="#000000" back_bg_color="#ffffff" back_text_color="#000000" back_head_color="#c8da2c" front_bg_color="#ffffff" front_icon_color="#02abdb"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][flip_box front_head_size="20px" front_text="by 3D Insider | J. Flynt" back_head_size="20px" back_text="In an age where both our jobs and our home lives have become more demanding, stress is a more serious problem than ever, with many negative effects on body and mind. With this knowledge, stress monitoring has increasingly become a popular sub-branch of healthcare wearables." back_text_size="14px" front_border_color="#ffffff" back_link="https://3dinsider.com/stress-monitoring-devices/" target="_blank" icon_type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-ravelry" icon_back="no" front_head="Comparison of Stress Monitoring Devices" back_head="Read More" back_inner_bg_color="#ffffff" back_border_color="#ffffff" front_text_color="#000000" back_bg_color="#ffffff" back_text_color="#000000" back_head_color="#c8da2c" front_bg_color="#ffffff" front_icon_color="#02abdb"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][flip_box front_head_size="20px" front_text="by CNN Health | A. Enayati" back_head_size="20px" back_text="N. Moraveji from Stanford Calming Lab said ``People are reconsidering the blind pursuit of technology as an end. Some of us in the tech community are thinking about the effects of digital toxins the same way engineers, policy-makers, and designers consider environmental toxins.``" back_text_size="14px" front_border_color="#ffffff" back_link="https://edition.cnn.com/2012/10/05/health/enayati-technology-reduce-stress/index.html" target="_blank" icon_type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-ravelry" icon_back="no" front_head="Technology can reduce our stress, too" back_head="Read More" back_inner_bg_color="#ffffff" back_border_color="#ffffff" front_text_color="#000000" back_bg_color="#ffffff" back_text_color="#000000" back_head_color="#c8da2c" front_bg_color="#ffffff" front_icon_color="#02abdb"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][flip_box front_head_size="20px" front_text="by Bustle | JT Thorpe" back_head_size="20px" back_text="Is your brain being severely emotionally unhelpful? Would you like it to be entirely restructured to be sane, sensible, and not prone to weeping hysterically when you see a puppy? You may be in luck." back_text_size="14px" front_border_color="#ffffff" back_link="https://www.bustle.com/articles/165306-can-you-rewire-your-brain-5-scientific-ways-to-change-emotional-habits" target="_blank" icon_type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-ravelry" icon_back="no" front_head="Can You Rewire Your Brain? 5 Scientific Ways To Change Emotional Habits" back_head="Read More" back_inner_bg_color="#ffffff" back_border_color="#ffffff" front_text_color="#000000" back_bg_color="#ffffff" back_text_color="#000000" back_head_color="#c8da2c" front_bg_color="#ffffff" front_icon_color="#02abdb"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][flip_box front_head_size="20px" front_text="by Psychology Today" back_head_size="20px" back_text="New research identifies how the birth of new neurons can reshape the brain. For over a decade, neuroscientists have been trying to figure out how neurogenesis and neuroplasticity work together to reshape how we think, remember, and behave." back_text_size="14px" front_border_color="#ffffff" back_link="https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/the-athletes-way/201702/how-do-neuroplasticity-and-neurogenesis-rewire-your-brain" target="_blank" icon_type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-ravelry" icon_back="no" front_head="How Do Neuroplasticity and Neurogenesis Rewire Your Brain?" back_head="Read More" back_inner_bg_color="#ffffff" back_border_color="#ffffff" front_text_color="#000000" back_bg_color="#ffffff" back_text_color="#000000" back_head_color="#c8da2c" front_bg_color="#ffffff" front_icon_color="#02abdb"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1510834572983{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;background-image: url(https://rockythemes.com/creativo-gym/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/classes-head.jpg?id=90) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1509646073541{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Classes" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:68px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700"][vc_column_text]If several languages coalesce, the grammar of the resulting language is more simple and regular than that of the individual languages. The new common language will be more simple and regular than the existing European languages. It will be as simple as Occidental; in fact, it will be Occidental. To an English person, it will seem like simplified English, as a skeptical Cambridge friend of mine told me what Occidental is.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row video_bg="yes" video_placeholder="434" video_bg_url="https://youtu.be/nnVdaEeAN_Q" css=".vc_custom_1583401529062{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;background-image: url(https://rempower.tech/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/AdobeStock_53644925-scaled.jpeg?id=437) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row eq_height="yes" content_placement="top" css=".vc_custom_1509627956258{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInLeft" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1509714364052{padding-top: 30% !important;padding-bottom: 30% !important;background-image: url(https://rockythemes.com/creativo-gym/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/classes_1.jpg?id=83) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInRight" width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1509714379468{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-color: #f1f8f9 !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Swimming" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24|line_height:45px" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700" css=".vc_custom_1509627343369{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1509624478589{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"]The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words.

If several languages coalesce, the grammar of the resulting language is more simple and regular than that of the individual languages. The new common language will be more simple and regular than the existing European languages. It will be as simple as Occidental.[/vc_column_text][vc_button title="View Swimming classes schedule" color="custom" custom_font_size="12px" custom_line_height="25px" custom_font_weight="600" Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words.

It will be as simple as Occidental.[/vc_column_text][vc_button title="View Yoga classes schedule" color="custom" custom_font_size="12px" custom_line_height="25px" custom_font_weight="600" custom_color="#d03672" custom_border_color="#d03672" custom_color_hover="#1d1c24" custom_border_color_hover="#1d1c24" align="left"][vc_separator style="solid" color="#d5e5e8" padding_top="25" padding_bottom="25"][jump_links values="%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%2290%20MINUTES%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20fa-clock-o%22%7D%2C%7B%22label%22%3A%22EXPERT%20LEVEL%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20fa-line-chart%22%7D%2C%7B%22label%22%3A%22550%20KCAL%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20fa-heartbeat%22%7D%5D" style="custom" link_align="left" link_spacing="30px" link_font_size="11px" link_font_weight="600" link_line_height="1" link_color="#1d1c24" link_color_hover="#d03672"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row eq_height="yes" content_placement="top" css=".vc_custom_1509644929961{padding-bottom: 10% !important;}"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInLeft" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1509714604063{padding-top: 30% !important;padding-bottom: 30% !important;background-image: url(https://rockythemes.com/creativo-gym/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/classes_6.jpg?id=88) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInRight" width="2/3" css=".vc_custom_1509714611676{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-right: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-color: #f1f8f9 !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Boxing" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:38px|text_align:left|color:%231d1c24|line_height:45px" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700" css=".vc_custom_1509643735678{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1509624478589{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"]The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth. For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. Everyone realizes why a new common language would be desirable: one could refuse to pay expensive translators. To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words.

If several languages coalesce, the grammar of the resulting language is more simple and regular than that of the individual languages. The new common language will be more simple and regular than the existing European languages. It will be as simple as Occidental.[/vc_column_text][vc_button title="View Boxing classes schedule" color="custom" custom_font_size="12px" custom_line_height="25px" custom_font_weight="600" custom_color="#d03672" custom_border_color="#d03672" custom_color_hover="#1d1c24" custom_border_color_hover="#1d1c24" align="left"][vc_separator style="solid" color="#d5e5e8" padding_top="25" padding_bottom="25"][jump_links values="%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22120%20MINUTES%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20fa-clock-o%22%7D%2C%7B%22label%22%3A%22MASTER%20LEVEL%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20fa-line-chart%22%7D%2C%7B%22label%22%3A%221550%20KCAL%22%2C%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20fa-heartbeat%22%7D%5D" style="custom" link_align="left" link_spacing="30px" link_font_size="11px" link_font_weight="600" link_line_height="1" link_color="#1d1c24" link_color_hover="#d03672"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row eq_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1509714634546{padding-top: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 11% !important;background-image: url(https://rockythemes.com/creativo-gym/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/classes_bg_form.jpg?id=89) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" el_class="enable_overflow"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="Join Online" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:38|text_align:left|color:%23262626|line_height:45px" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="font_weight_700"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1509387297369{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

Join our gym at any time 7 days a week with a affordable price and discounts for students. To an English person, it will seem like simplified English.

item.title: The opportunity in the current crisis
item.dc:creator: Valentina Tudose
item.content:encoded:
If you opened any newspaper or turned on the TV since the beginning of this decade, it's likely you're thinking "What is happening to our world!?"

Yes, we are experiencing a major crisis and signs were all there to see if you only cared to watch objectively. Politically, in the last couple of years, the global landscape has been an endless source of despair for some and comedy topics for others (possibly both to everyone!). Economically, pundits have been predicting crashes and the end of the world as we know it for years!

It's clear we're going through a major realignment period where many old ideas, habits, and beliefs will end up transformed, mutated, hopefully (some at least!) eradicated.

I feel this crisis is a turning point for our society - at least in Hong Kong, if not at a global level.

Hong Kong functioned for years as a very stable system. A safe, comfortable, balanced city. We had prosperity, an easy life, everything run smoothly and people were happy with their lot. But, behind the scenes, tensions accumulated.

People put all their energy into work. The 'work hard, play hard' mentality meant pressure to always perform to certain (unhealthy and unreasonable!) standards. More work did mean more money (for some, at least) but it didn't ease off the pressure or made people happier. Quite the opposite actually! Well paid professionals felt more and more unable to afford a lifestyle they thought was the sign that they made it! They stretched themselves thin to reach that sense of ultimate achievement, only to find themselves depleted and demotivated, losing themselves.

Things got worse at a macro level too. Unspoken worries and fears built up and a general sense of anxiety for what the future holds started to be felt in the air. Then the protests happened. What used to be a place proud of the softest revolution a few years back became chaotic and destructive, unpredictable and, most of all, unsolvable.

The Coronavirus was the final drop!

People who a few months ago didn't have a care in the world are now fighting for toilet paper as if the virus was bringing dysentery not a cough!

So yeah, things have changed but this is only the beginning.

But it does not have to be the beginning of the end!

I feel the Universe is giving us a break. Time to reassess and recreate a new city, a new society. A more balanced space in which we can all work smart and enjoy life more, in which our sense of self-worth is not dependent on our bank account or brand of car and watch. In which 'working from home' means being as productive and as successful as going to the office every day.

A world in which we trust ourselves more and the people around us.

The fact is the Universe seeks balance. Our whole world - on a physical and emotional level - is based on the principle of Homeostasis.

"For a complex system, to endure is not enough; it must adapt itself to modifications of the environment and it must evolve. Otherwise, outside forces will soon disorganize and destroy it. The paradoxical situation that confronts all those responsible for the maintenance and evolution of a complex system, whether the system be a state, a large organization, or an industry, can be expressed in the simple question, How can a stable organization whose goal is to maintain itself and endure be able to change and evolve?"

So this is the question!

How can we as a societal system reorganize and reinvent ourselves so we change, evolve and thrive?

The solution to this crisis is NOT going back to how things were but it is taking on the OPPORTUNITY to change all those things that didn't work and make them into something new and better.

So here are my questions for you:

  1. What are 3 things you would change about the way we work?
  2. What are 3 things you would change about how we connect to each other?
  3. What are 3 things you need to change and evolve about yourself?
Read About Author â Velentina Tudose

item.title: 3 Subtle Ways We Give Away Our Power
item.dc:creator: Valentina Tudose
item.content:encoded:
Can you remember a time you really wanted to leave the office early, but the boss called you in and gave you another pile of work?

Or that time when what you really wanted was a quiet night at home but ended up going out (only to hate every single minute of it?)

Or even when you agreed to give your kids the candy because you didn't want them to think of you as 'bad mom'?

What if I told you that these little, seemingly unimportant decisions are just a few of the many instances in which we lose a little bit of ourselves every single day?

You may think âbut whatâs wrong with being flexible and helping out the teamâ? Or âI really need to make more time for my friends so itâs ok to push myself to see themâ. Or âI donât see my kids enough so what's wrong with a little treat every now and then?' 

There is nothing wrong with any of these things if these decisions are really what you want.

If youâre taking on the new project because you know it will make your life easier in the long run, it is totally worth it. But the truth is, most of the time youâre doing it to please the boss, get the brownie points and hope that he remembers it at appraisal time.

Because weâre all programmed to be pleasers. 

Being the social animals that we are, we live for approval from others, otherwise known as external validation. We find comfort and a measure of our own sense of identity and value in being appreciated and accepted by people around us. And we are prepared to go to great lengths to gain that approval. Because it feels good.

The downside is this also teaches others that itâs ok to keep doing what theyâre doing: taking our time, our energy, our love, our friendship, our acceptance. Without actually giving much in return.

A simple law of physics says that when energy moves in only one direction it creates a gap, an imbalance in the system. 

Each time we give more than we receive, we give away more and more of our power. Until we get depleted! We feel empty, lost or numb.

The first thing we do is say âyesâ to things we donât want, just so we fit in. 

âLetâs do this again next weekâ may say a random Tinder match at the end of the most boring date ever. Even if youâve barely stopped yourself from falling asleep hearing him talk about himself the entire time (and deep down you know youâre never going to do it), youâll probably agree, fake-enthusiastically: âSure that would be great.â Actually, you already know youâll never bother and most likely youâll think about unmatching him before youâre even in the taxi. But hey, doing that and saying how you feel is rude and your mum told you to avoid hurting peoplesâ feelings, right? So, you do neither and he thinks you really want to see him again.

You may assume that little white lie costs you nothing, only to find the guy will keep chasing you incessantly, believing when you tell him âyeah sure, letâs try next weekâ. The cost is not just your valuable time but also the impact of that conflict on your emotional state:

The part of you that says âI really donât want to see this guy againâ fighting with âBut if I really told him I donât want to see him again, I will hurt his feelings (with the implication that 'he may not actually like me, so that will hurt my feelings').

Well, if you don't want to see him again, why not tell him the truth? Gently, nicely, factually, without judgment or criticism â after all youâve been on one single date, so how hurt can he be?

Now letâs go back to the boss giving you more work. You know that realistically the only way you will be able to finish that proposal is by missing your kids' bedtime story - again! Well, youâll make it up to them with some extra chocolate pudding at lunch tomorrow (because yeah, you do feel guilty, but you donât have a choice). 

And here comes the next subtle way we give away our power:

We donât say ânoâ to things we really donât want, even when they cause us pain because we are too afraid of the consequences (some real, others, quite possibly, entirely made up!)

I bet that your to-do list is as long as your arm and, frankly, your boss must be either blind or a total monster not to realize how busy you are already!

The truth of the matter is you want him to think of you as efficient, great at your job, a problem solver, a reliable, solid member of the teamâ¦ So you never told him how overwhelmed you are, how many of the details fall through the cracks every day and how much damage limitation you have to do - in addition to all the new work! â to keep the boat from sinking.

And at what price? Burn out, anxiety, stress! Arguments at home (because youâre never there), your kids feeling youâre just a distant aunty who shows up every now and then.... and so much more.

This brings me to the final point: overcompensation.

âWell, I may not be there every night reading your bedtime story, but who gives you candy every time you ask for it and buys you all the toys you can possibly imagine? (Because it makes up for me not being there for you (or so I hope!).

We overcompensate by saying âyesâ to things we donât want and not daring to say no to what really doesnât work at all, because we donât feel good enough and if we really told people how we feel, they might not like us.

But do you really need everyone to like you?

What if you simply told the date âthis has been nice but I really donât feel we have much in common so I wish you all the best in your search for love. Thank you for your timeâ?

Or walk into your boss's office first thing tomorrow (assuming you're not working from home), show him all the wonderful things you are doing and also tell him which projects will require additional resources as youâve prioritized whatâs urgent and important and you will focus on that?

The most likely outcome is he will understand how truly valuable you are to the team because of your ability to think, communicate and set clear boundaries and not dump everything on your desk because he knows youâll find a way to get it done, even if it means not seeing your children.

So what can you do right now to get your power back? 

âThe best way to get what you want is to say no to what you donât want!â

Author: Valentina Tudose

18th or March, 2020

item.title: Stress and Anxiety in the World of GadgetsâTodayâs Market of Emotion Detection and Recognition
item.dc:creator: Patricia
item.content:encoded:
Ironically, I have started this article before the COVID-19 outbreak. But, more than ever, it feels relevant to finish it now.

There is no question that technology has added some stress to our lives in general on the one hand. Yet innovation has made it easier on the other. With laptops, smartphones, tablets, wearables, and endless other devices, we are only a few seconds away from the demands of our daily obligations. However, with all these tools at our fingertips, we do not seem any happier. The pressure of âkeeping up,â amplified by access to digital media, increases vulnerability to feelings of isolation or loneliness. Itâs effortless to lose perspective.

However, there are ways to help reduce stress and encourage relaxation with the use of advancements in technology. Letâs look into a few of them.

The tech industry is ready to shake up the world of wearable devices in 2020 and beyond.

There is no lack of wearables here. Some top-rated devices like FitBit and Apple Watch are well-known for their physical fitness tracking. They can help you focus on your breathing by replicating a calming breathing rhythm with small vibrating buzzes. In contrast, others provide a guided breathing exercise to balance yourself based on your heart rate variability (HRV). Non-wrist wearables, like Vitaliâs âsmart braâ that track your HRV and posture, and help to identify your stress factors. Last but not least, our personal favoriteâNeuroon. A smart sleep mask that provides not only sleep analysis, but also detects rapid eye movement sleep (REM sleep), light techniques to wake up easily, and LD meditation.

If you experience stress in your daily life, consider the benefits and ease of stress retreats and meditation technologiesâtake care of your body and spirit.

Meditation of todayâs world definitely took in a broader meaning. It is not anymore about sitting peacefully in the beautiful scenery, taking a vow of silence while you commune with nature. It is also a calming technique during a stressful day or week. A few minutes is enough. It is important not to underestimate all the ways technology helps with stress and anxiety. Products from companies like Muse will use your brain activity to train you to relax, identify distractions, and teach you how to apply calming techniques to your daily routine. Headspace offers a smartphone app with guided themed meditation sessions that can fit into your hectic day and helps you to manage stress.

Feeling connected in a greater sense to a community empowers you to overcome stress and anxiety.

We all can agree that social media is a double-edged sword. They allow you to stay connected with friends and loved ones, leading to better mental and emotional health. On the other hand, these sites become hubs of pressure and unrealistic expectations quickly. Some are a great source of humor, music, and positive imagery. A few minutes watching content can bring a good laugh or remind of the compassion and love that exists in the world. They can help to escape from an otherwise stressful day and hit the restart button on mood. 

It is essential to benefit from these virtual, social groups in a very conscious way. Most importantly, to benefit from managing stress and improving emotional and physical well-being. The sense of community, even digital, empowers individuals to enhance their self-esteem and not to feel isolated with problems. Staying in contact with other people not only staves off boredom, but it is also critical for minimizing the sense of isolation. Talking to others who are going through similar challenges provides a sense of community and empowerment.

Immersing yourself in a digital universe allows you to detach from daily stress factors and give an entirely new set of sensations.

Some games immerse you in violent, high speed and high action worlds. They require concentration, quick reflexes, and can make you anxious as you try to beat the clock. Fortunately, other online games focus on stress reduction, creating a relaxing virtual reality. Games like Little Wheel and Echogenesis create relaxing digital worlds with beautiful, calming graphics. Others, like Pigment, give you access to a digital version of adult coloring books that have gained popularity recently. Coloring, like painting by numbers, has been known to reduce stress, enhance concentration, and help you practice mindfulness.

Well-being and good health become a game-changing competitive sport.

Technology helps to manage stress in our home, or when we are away from it. We can make life less stressful with many innovative smart-home devices, like Nasket. This smart home device connects groceries, food making, and home services. Moreover, it brings together other smart-home tools that include security cameras, safety monitors, or even a âsmartâ washing machine or refrigerator. In the end, anything that puts our minds at ease contributes to reducing the stress of daily life.

Furthermore, wellness and fitness programs often go hand-in-hand and give you the flexibility of place and time to use their benefits. With access to over a hundred 30-minute workouts, you can try a variety of routines. Many celebrity trainers offer online streaming subscriptions that will make you feel like you have a personal trainer in the comfort of your own home. Stress and anxiety applications, like Rempower.Tech, monitor the behavior, and connect you anonymously with a community of support and shared experience. Feeling strong, active, and healthy is essential to mental wellness, and keeps you feeling more balanced and relaxed throughout the day. 

As we become more aware of the connection between emotional states and physical health, affective computing continues to bring new methods of understanding.

Relatively new, affective computing uses both hardware and software technology to detect the emotional state of a person. It is an active research area that has seen much growth in technology geared toward affective state analysis. It touches on many aspects of human interaction that none other technology does, like speech, body language, facial expressions, and psychological monitoring. Thanks to some advanced algorithms, they classify emotions based on gathered data.

Let's take an example of facial expressions, which are a mixture of an individual's cognitive state, intention, personality, and psychology. They are quite often used to communicate messages in interpersonal relationships. Facial expressions are also gestures that are extremely helpful in responding to a particular speech. Therefore, there is tremendous potential for affective computing applications in education, health care, gaming, and many others.

Can technology show and direct people how to learn to manage stress and lead happier, healthier lives?

With all that advancements accessible at our fingertips can we âturn the ship around?â Technology that gives us extra anxiety can work to our advantage. Cutting edge advancements can help us relieve stress, form positive interpersonal connections, encourage mental and emotional health, and ultimately empower every individual on an unimaginable scale. The global emotion detection and recognition market size is expected to grow from USD 21.6 billion in 2019 to USD 56.0 billion by 2024, at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 21.0% during the forecast period (Markets and Markets). Factors such as the rising need for socially intelligent, conversational artificial agents and expert systems, affective computing, increasing demand for speech-based biometric solutions, technological advancements across the globe, and growing need for high operational excellence will work in favor of the market in the foreseeable future.  

As expected, with these innovative market entries, vendors from all over the world compete for a leading market position. That includes Apple (US), Google (US), Microsoft (US), IBM (US), Affectiva (US), Beyond Verbal (Israel), Noldus Information Technology (Netherlands), Tobii (Sweden), NEC Corporation (Japan), Sentiance (Belgium), nViso (Switzerland), Eyesight Technologies (Israel), Ayonix (Japan), Cognitec Systems (Germany), SightCorp (Netherlands), CrowdEmotion (UK), Kairos (US), Eyeris (US), and SkyBiometry (Lithuania), and iMotions (Denmark) (Markets and Markets). Not even mentioning the multitude of smaller players. 

Stress management technologies from all these vendors come in many ways and forms, from apps through gaming to social mediaâjust to name a few. Whenever you feel anxious or stressed, you may get help and relief from tools available on your mobile device that you can benefit from regardless of where you are. Obviously, reducing stress in our lives is critical for our overall physical and mental health over time. Importantly, many data sources are proving the correlation between stress and illnesses. Chronic stress lowers your immune system, leads to heart-related illnesses, causes insomnia, and may result in obesity, substance abuse, or depression. Not even mentioning low self-esteem and lack of empowerment. It may be impossible to eliminate stress from our lives.

By Patricia Slawinska and Anna Guetat from Rempower.Tech

References:

Markets and Markets (February, 2020), Emotion Detection and Recognition Market by Technology (Feature Extraction & 3D Modeling, NLP, ML), Software Tool (Facial Expression Recognition, Speech & Voice Recognition), Application Area, End User, and Region - Global Forecast to 2024, Retrieved from Emotion Detection and Recognition Market;

Health Compare (March 2, 2018, revised on October 15, 2019), Ways Technology Can Reduce Stress, Retrieved from HealthCompare.com;

National Center for Immunization and Respiratory Diseases (NCIRD), Division of Viral Diseases, Manage Anxiety & Stress, Retrieved from CDC.com;

Michael Sawh (January 28, 2020), Wearable Hotlist: The tech set to shake up wearables in 2020, Retrieved from Wearable.com;

Meghann Chilcott (March 8, 2020), Wearing It Well: The Next Steps For Wearable Medical Technology, Retrieved from Forbes.com;

item.title: This is YOUR time!
item.dc:creator: Valentina Tudose
item.content:encoded:
This pandemic is a blessing in disguise! 

I know it is not a popular opinion right now with so many people dying and many more in danger, so youâre probably thinking âwhat is she onâ?â¦

Well, you donât have to agree with me but maybe consider this as a possibility:

This crisis is a chance for all of us - everyday people - to create our future: a better future hopefully, for ourselves and our children. 

I always felt this virus was the way the Universe was forcing us to face what we have refused to see for so long. 

All the things we have created to give ourselves control, wealth, powerâ¦. Which we now realize were nothing but illusionsâ¦.

We have very little control over what happens in our lives (often not even over ourselves), our wealth is nothing but convention and power is something most of us have given away a long time ago when we allowed others to make choices for us - out of convenience, ignorance or just because we didnât know what power really means. 

So what could the coronavirus be teaching us?

The last decade has been all about division and hate. Online and offline people have wanted to be special, to keep things for themselves by excluding others: think Brexit, Mexican Wall, âsocial media detoxâ, all the way to blocking your exâ¦ 

Corona brings us together by forcing us to stay apart so we can once again rediscover how fundamentally interconnected we are. How much we are not special but are just like the cells inside our bodies - dependent on each other for survival! 

But there is ONE thing that we must do alone - and that is a superpower!

Itâs called CHOICE! But it only works if we DO SOMETHING with it. We TAKE ACTION. 

We do have the power to control the future through the choices we make right now! 

But how do we control something that has not happened yet? 

In times of trouble, we expect governments to protect citizens and safeguard our way of life. This time, itâs becoming clear that we, the people, have the power AND the responsibility to get involved. No matter how good or bad a governmentâs response to the epidemic is, each human on the planet is now involved in future creation.

And yes, what we are asked to do is nothing - temporarily. Literally sit around to save the world!

But we can all do something right now and thatâs to decide what we will change in ourselves every single day!

We all know the world is not going back. Whatever we used to describe as ânormalâ is never going to happen again. If you sit at home watching Netflix counting the days till life will go âback to normalâ you are deluding yourself. 

Things are changing every second, every hour and day. And they will continue to do so because the only constant in this Universe is Change. 

So a new world, a new 'normal' is being born right now. 

The big question is what kind of âfuture nowâ you want to build for yourself? 

One in which the government, the media or your boss tells you what to do, decides whatâs good for you and monitors your every move? Or one in which you take the power to decide Who you want to be and How you show up for others?

This is Your time! Your chance! Your opportunity to shape the world.

What will you do with this Power?

item.title: Jonathan Dot
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded: For science, music, sport, etc, Europe uses the same vocabulary. The languages only differ in their grammar, their pronunciation and their most common words. To achieve this, it would be necessary to have uniform grammar, pronunciation and more common words.

item.title: Overcome Your Body with Your Mind
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded: Our psoas major muscle, sometimes lovingly called, the âmuscle of the soulâ, is a core-stabilizing muscle and runs from the thigh bone through the length of the belly, connected at the lowest thoracic vertebra, around where your rib cage ends, all the way down your lower back, extending through the pelvis to attach on the inside of the upper femur. It crosses three major joints, the hip socket, the joint between the lumbar spine and the sacrum, and the sacroiliac joint- thatâs a lot of coverage! And it is responsible for so much as well. It affects our mobility, structural balance, joint function, flexibility, and not only helps you stand up straight and lift your legs to walk, research shows that this incredible part of our body, is also vital to our psychological wellbeing. Liz Koch, the author of The Psoas Book, writes that our psoas âliterally embodies our deepest urge for survival, and more profoundly, our elemental desire to flourish.â By keeping our psoas healthy, it is entirely possible to improve mental health, or if to speak in yogi terms, having the ability to create healing energy. Part of the stress response that is in our nervous system is the contraction of the major flexors of the torso. When we go through stress, trauma, or something unpleasant, even if its just small little incident or an argument with a loved one, it is all tied together. Our body responds by tightening the gut, hunching the shoulders, holding it all in tightly as a modern response to protect ourselves. All of the things we have been holding in turns into chronic tension and contraction, and we start thinking of it as normal, we actually get used to the pain. Because of negative social standards, we have ignored our natural way of releasing tension in our bodies and our psoas, just like animals instinctual shake to discharge tension, we used to do the same- ever heard someone say, âshake it offâ? Since early age we have learned that shakes, tremors, or to show vulnerability is a sign of weakness, and that we must hold everything in so tightly instead of just allowing us to let go. If you think back of a time you were crying and very upset about something, didnât your body automatically start to shake and tremor? Our bodies are filled with incredible capabilities, many we take for granted or donât even pay much attention to. Source:Â Mandy Martiniâs blog

Women & Leadership, Female Empowerment, and MARC - "Men advocating real change" Padraig Walsh, Jennifer Doman Flowers ææ, Louise Corbett, Valentina Tudose, Patricia Slawinska

item.title: Reprogram Your Brain!
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded: Fortunately, while the human brain is prone to negativity, it's also flexible, which is why you can reprogram it to be happy simply by taking 10 to 30 seconds to focus on how happy you feel when you're experiencing a small pleasure. With the help of our technology from #Mindfio we will discuss and show all the tricks that can change your day for better!

item.title: Revealing the World of Online Dating and Metal Health
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded:
Please join us at one or both of these FREE seminars about online dating and mental health facilitated by Claire Young. Is it really helping you to fall in love with the digital world? or is it simply a reason for new disappointment?

Claire Young Therapy Valentina Tudose

Here is the sign-up link if you would like to attend. https://bit.ly/39U2oRk

item.title: TEDxTinHauWomen
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded: It is official and it has happened! Valentina Tudose talked about unconditional love last Friday during TEDxTinHauWomen! The event was completely sold out and great success followed even more amazing story! Soon we will share the link to watch it! Stay tuned.

item.title: Finding Peace
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded:
How to make peace with the past, be empowered in the present, and hopeful for the future?

How to live your truth?

In times of crisis and confusion, living our truth will carry us trough. Remember, you are in control. Yet, for that, you need to experience inner and unshakeable peace. We will take you on a journey to renew your body, mind, and spiritâan inward journey in a safe, sound, and relaxing environment. We will immerse you in the retreat experience and send you back home with a sense of peace that remains long after the physical experience is over.

item.title: Rewired to Happy
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded:
Architect your mind.

Connect with your inner power that ignites your power, connection, and purpose.

Imagine that you are the architect of your brain. Until recently, the conventional thinking was that our brains were hardwired at birth and therefore unchangeable. But the good news is that our daily experiences are continually reshaping our brains â that is the neuroplasticity. You can control and improve how you think, act, and behave as long as you choose your actions and experiences with care.

Neuroplasticity refers to your brainâs ability to reorganize itself, both physically and functionally, throughout your life due to your environment, behavior, thinking, and emotions. One of the key aspects of neural plasticity is calledÂ Neural Darwinism, or âneural pruning,â which means that any neuron that isnât âfired-and-wiredâ together into a network is likely to be extinguished. The key is to activate as many of these pathways as possible, given they work synergistically.

During the event, we will provide you with methods and techniques to architect your brain for a better self.

item.title: Life-Balance Algorithm
item.dc:creator: anna.guetat
item.content:encoded:
Life is like riding a bicycle.

To keep your balance, you must keep moving, and you must steer it.

Trying to keep up with the ever-increasing demands of a busy lifestyle feels like an impossible task. Many of us inevitably find ourselves taking on more and more commitments, while at the same time continually analyzing our performance and wondering why our life seems out of balance.

When it comes to balancing life and work, it can be helpful to acknowledge that neither side is ever permanently static. When we accept this ambiguity, then we are better at managing challenges that arise and even learn to appreciate the imperfect harmony of life.

During the event, we allow you to rediscover that personal time matters, prioritization and focusing on fundamentals. And, most importantly, how to take it peacefully with inner balance.
